messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: understanding unschooling better with or without...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/23/2002 11:29:49 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... There is a new book out about homeschooling kids with varous disorders. The author is an
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/23/2002 11:29:49 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
rumpleteasermom@... writes:


> Nope, not alone. But if you have a child obsessive-compulsive
> disorder, it doesn't really help to only hear advice about how to
> unschool a kid without it . . . especially when the advice doesn't
> even begin to address the problems.
>
> Bridget
>
> ps - anyone dealing with OCD and/or anxiety disorders? How about
> Tourette Syndrom? I have questions.

There is a new book out about homeschooling kids with varous disorders. The
author is an unschooler. http://www.primapublishing.com/books/book/5696/

pamS



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
